phrases: Hyakkimaru got injured due to the sudden return of his hearing.
A girl named Mio took him in.
Mio lived with children who had been orphaned in the war.
But on the night Hyakkimaru went out to fight a demon...
I cannot... I cannot believe it.
He should not have fought with that injury.
Yes, he lost his leg but got his voice back.
But I still want to dance
Someday, one day my passion's fire will
One day the flames would die out
Hey, I thought I did not need anything
But even now, I am so serious
I still have time to make it
Ah... but I am going to burn it up, baby
Sorry darling, it is not that easy
But surely it is not that bad either
I am going to burn it up, yeah
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
I am going to burn it up, yeah
6 The story of the Moriko Song, part 2
It is nothing, I just tripped.
I told you that you should not work at both camps.
It was just too early for him to fight.
It is okay, I am used to this.
You get food ready for everyone.
What, should not you be keeping watch over your guy?
But Mio will take good care of him.
Jeez, Mio sure likes to take care of people.
Take, have you ever seen your sis at work?
Cannot leave the little ones alone.
I mean, we have to rely on her or we will all starve to death.
I am not blaming you or anything.
We all made a promise together to someday own our own rice paddy.
It is going to be all green in the summer and golden in the fall.
We will grow more rice than we can eat.
We have only seen rice paddies burnt by war or dried up by droughts.
But Mio said they all used to be golden.
Let us make our very own rice paddy some day.
I will be able to work too in a little bit, so Mio will not have to work so hard.
War took a lot from us, so let us get it back.
We are blessed by rains every year.
Let me join the army to suppress the Sakai clan.
I will crush that little domain like it is nothing.
If that is how you think, it is too early for you.
Mother, please tell Father to let me go to war.
Then no it is, no matter what I say.
If only he would let me go,
I know I would distinguish myself in battle and make you proud.
My feats would not impress you?
That is not what I mean.
No, you are always like that, Mother.
No matter what prize I hunt down or how great I am at martial arts,
I do not like things to do with war.
It is not war you do not like, but me.
Tahomaru, what mother would not love her child?
You do not have to say it.
I was being a bit childish.
Mother has never been unkind to me.
Young Master, please, that is dangerous!
Please, you must not be up there!
There is something else that Mother cares for much more in this world.
She will never say it, but she is hiding something.
It is the same for Father, too.
We all sit atop a small cornerstone.
I understand that you are frustrated, but what if you die?
I pushed myself too hard as well, so I get it.
I knew it was not easy to make money.
I would already promised I would never cry because of a samurai ever again.
If you try too hard and die, you lose.
Anyways, I heard you found your voice.
Is your voice too loud for you?
You will get used to it.
Dororo said you were like a beast in a cave the way you are now.
I sing whenever I feel sad.
Yes, just like that girl says, I will take it slowly.
I will just go around the place the monster is.
I am in no hurry anyway.
Although it would be useless to try and tell Hyakkimaru that.
If you take a toy from a baby, it will get mad and take it back.
Especially since what they took from him is his own body.
He is calm when he is listening to that song.
The demon flames Hyakkimaru has had since he was a baby.
You could say they are the embers left from when they took his body.
You better hope the beast that comes out of the cave is not a monster.
Do not look at me so much.
You can see people's souls, right?
Please do not look at mine.
I do not loathe these hands.
But it would be an embarrassment to wait.
We will plan a surprise attack.
Do not let them sense it.
Tell everyone to be on the watch for Sakai spies.
Oh, you know what my job is...
I did not look on purpose!
It is okay, I am not ashamed about it.
But I understand if you want to keep your distance.
It is not a nice job.
But I am amazed at how a boy your age understood what my job was.
I traveled around with my mama a lot.
And that is the only job Mama did not do no matter how hungry we got.
Mama was admirable, but so are you for staying alive.
You are going to take back what war took from you, right?
Come on, it will make you stronger.
So what if you lost a leg?
You got your voice back, so say something.
Come on, you need to eat if you want to use that voice.
You will not lose to it, will you?
You will never become a monster, right?
I am going to work, but do not let Hyakkimaru go to fight it.
His body is not ready for it.
It is stuck on your arm?
But we have got something cool, too.
We found them at the battlefield.
Hyakkimaru went to beat the monster!
Jeez, how could you go without telling me?
But good thing your leg grew back.
Are you one of them too?
This girl came to do lewd business at our camp.
But we saw her enter the Sakai camp last night.
She is been disposed of for being a suspected spy.
I see you are one of them, too.
You better hope the beast that comes out of the cave is not a monster.
Spare me, please, I beg you...
You cannot turn into a monster!
Hyakkimaru, Mio had this with her.
She really got it back from the samurai.
To make her own rice paddy.
Our footsteps admonish indifference in such verbose ways
As I peek into your fathomless eyes, I lose my composure
Is there any hope in the place I am heading to?
because this road is so dark
I will be there to shine the light
I am used to playing at saying goodbye,
but I cried when I waved to you
Our fiery woes fade... and fade... until night falls upon us
If I knew tomorrow would be so mundane,
I would not have said that I wanted to live
I know it is futile but cannot help dreaming of a future... a future... you are to blame
